tasks.label: Install on Open
tasks.command: if [[ "${config:shouldRunNPMTask}" == "true" ]]; then npm i && (cd functions && npm i); else echo "Could not run NPM on project open! To enable automatic NPM installs when the project is opened, run the 'Toggle Install on File Open' task and select 'true' when prompted."; fi

tasks.label: Toggle Install on File Open
tasks.command: if [[ "${input:runNPM}" == "true" ]]; then sed 's/"shouldRunNPMTask": false/"shouldRunNPMTask": true/' .vscode/settings.json > tmp.txt && mv tmp.txt .vscode/settings.json; else sed 's/"shouldRunNPMTask": true/"shouldRunNPMTask": false/' .vscode/settings.json > tmp.txt && mv tmp.txt .vscode/settings.json; fi
